class cheml.wrappers.scikit_learn.Preprocessor¶

Bases: object

Imputer_ManipulateHeader(transformer, df)¶
keep track of features (columns) that can be removed or changed in the
Imputer by transforming data back to pandas dataframe structure. This happens based on the “statistics_” attribute of Imputer.
transformer: sklearn Imputer class
The class with adjusted parameters.
df: Pandas dataframe
The dataframe that imputer is going to deal with.

transformed data frame fitted imputer class

Transformer_ManipulateHeader(transformer, df)¶
keep track of features (columns) that can be removed or changed in the
Scaler by transforming data back to pandas dataframe structure.
scaler: sklearn Scaler class
The class with adjusted parameters.
df: Pandas dataframe
The dataframe that scaler is going to deal with.

transformed data frame fitted scaler class

selector_dataframe(transformer, df, tf)¶
keep track of features (columns) that can be removed or changed in the
VarianceThreshold by transforming data back to pandas dataframe structure. This happens based on the “get_support” method of selector.
imputer: sklearn VarianceThreshold class
The class with adjusted parameters.
df: Pandas dataframe
data frame
tf: Pandas dataframe
target frame

transformed data frame fitted imputer class

cheml.wrappers.sct_utils.std_datetime_str(mode='datetime')¶

(std_time_str): This function gives out the formatted time as a standard string, i.e., YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss.
